column5: Well, we finally got thru the winter, but it sure doesn't look or feel like springtime outside yet with a foot of snow on the ground and cold weather hanging around, but what the heck, if the calander says it's springtime that's good enuff for me
Morning Lew and yes it hardly feels like spring yet, I'm sure there are many just waiting to put their boats in the water, it won't be long now. Everyone have a great day.  Regards, Sam

can't even get to my boat as its snowed in! Maybe I should haul the snowblower up to the cottage and dig her out.  Plan on hitting the river this weekend that otta hurry spring up  Happy spring to all  TB
Good mornin' Lew.  March winds as they say .. and they're howling outside.   Last week-end we saw the first flowers pushing up through the ground.  Yes - winter is slowly losing its grip down here.

has it been that long..... Crikeky...Ive been browsing the classifieds here since 5am. Good morning back at ya Lew. Yessir.Spring has Sprung......why the snow still..... Have a great first day of spring Bud!
Happy Spring to y'all!!! It won't be much longer before the snow and ice melts for ya's.
spring. i believe in. what i see,not what i hear. weatherman says 4-6 inches by friday..
Hi Lew,I heard a robin outside this morning,hope summer isn't to close,I haven't got the wife's to do list half finished yet!!! Rick.

Ice fishing doesn't close here till the end of March and then it's wait till 3rd sat in May before season re-opens, so it's still 2+ months away. But should be all downhill after we lose these cold days first.
We still have 10+ feet of 'Spring' all around the house.

LOL birds are still here, an early flight? Stupid birds, call ahead! We got 1 1/2 -2 inches of snow yesterday evening. Just hope the high waters doesn`t hurt the walleye spawn in the Erie tribs.  Way to early to get too excited here, we have had some pretty good snow falls even going into early April.

We usually have ice out here by April 15 but I think it might be a bit later this year as temps have remained well below normal for the last few weeks. There is a lot of open water at any if the places that feed into the lake, Fenelon Falls and the Scugog River but out in front of my place there is still at least 18" of solid ice.  Anyway Happy Spring everyone!
Same to you lew...unfortunately, just heard Environment Canada say to plan for 6 more weeks of winter.  Wonder if the new DST's messed up those groundhogs...
Mornin' Lew, -2 here in Missisauga, oh how I love the warmer days of spring

Are you sure Lew ?...  Spring may have sprung The grass ain't yet riz And I'm stitting here, wonderin' where in the hell the birdies iz...  Oh well, as long as the ice is gone by the last Saturday in April...
Happy Spring Lew!!!!!!!!  Bet you're having Musky withdrawal right about now eh?  Joey
